arts.ttl: Hoffenheim target Stefan Posch to join Atalanta, Florian Grillitsch to depart?
arts.sum: There's fresh news to report on the TSG 1899 Hoffenheim transfer front.

arts.ttl: Atalanta hijack Hoffenheim's move for Posch
arts.sum: Stefan Posch will apparently not be joining Hoffenheim, but Atalanta instead.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen keeps the pressure on Bayern Munich with 3-1 win over Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen kept pace with Bundesliga leader Bayern Munich by beating Hoffenheim 3-1 on Sunday with goals from Victor Boniface, Patrik Schick and Jeremie Frimpong. The Nigeria forward started for his first game since early November after recovering from a thigh injury, and he scored in the 15th minute with a shot that Hoffenheim ’keeper Luca Philipp should arguably have stopped.

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen weather Hoffenheim's late pressure in gripping 3-1 victory
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen triumphed over Hoffenheim 3-1 in an action-packed Bundesliga match complete with quickfire goals, a first in Bundesliga history, and a tense finish following a red card. Gift Orban celebrates after scoring Hoffenheim's consolation goal, injecting late drama into the match.
Bayer Leverkusen, despite going down to 10 men saw off Hoffenheim 3-1 to maintain the six-point gap to Bayern Munich at the top of the table. The first half was…

arts.ttl: Boniface returns with a goal in Leverkusen win over Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen continued their excellent league form with a dominant 3-1 win over toothless TSG Hoffenheim. The game saw the first stadium announcement by a referee in the Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Victor Boniface starts for Bayer Leverkusen after Al-Nassr move breaks down
arts.sum: Victor Boniface returns and starts for Bayer Leverkusen against Hoffenheim in the Bundesliga this evening after his move to Al-Nassr broke down. Despite reaching an agreement with both club and…

arts.ttl: Leicester City target Marius Bülter stays at Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Sky Germany report that despite interest from Leicester City and Augsburg, Marius Bülter has rejected all offers and will remain at Hoffenheim. The 31-year-old attacker has played in 12 of…

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Bayer Leverkusen vs. Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Bayer Leverkusen vs. Hoffenheim.

arts.ttl: Official | Hoffenheim bring goalkeeper Jakob Busk back to Germany
arts.sum: Hoffenheim officially brought long-time 1. FC Union Berlin keeper Jakob Busk back to German football on Saturday.
